name: Vera Swings
description:
A young girl named Vera falls asleep while gazing at the moon in the night sky. In her dream, she wakes to find herself swinging on the stars as they form a path up to the magical place she has always longed to visit. All she has to do is swing up and catch the stars above her, but this may prove more challenging than she thinks. And so begins Vera’s amazing journey up to the moon.

Help Vera reach the moon by swinging up the stars in this simple yet challenging platformer. Time your swings just right to catch the colorful stars and touch the glowing checkpoint to unlock the next level up. Don’t be fooled by the game’s simple design and calming music, though, for each level will be a challenge for your swinging and catching abilities.

Easy to learn but hard to master, Vera Swings will test your timing and precision as you guide this young dreamer through her magical quest to the moon. Hone your skills as you swing from platform to platform and climb higher through the sky to make Vera’s dream come true!
